messages.content:
Q: Im sorry, if there's already were these types of questions, but i wasn't able to find it through search.
Will the game contain any types of group PvE content? I mean different stuff like world bosses, dungeons or some scenario-type game events? 
Do the developers want to make an achievement collecting system? Maybe something like a journal with some categories of % completions?
<a:DogPet:846079372522684436>  thanks for your attention!

> Do the developers want to make an achievement collecting system? Maybe something like a journal with some categories of % completions?
Systems like these will exist, yes. With consideration for people being able to enjoy the game for it's own sake and not feel obligated to play the game in a way they don't enjoy.
